comments.text:
Really good place. The service area is reachable by bus + walk (bus n°4+ bus n°17, look on Naver map for the itinerary). We (a couple) waited 10min and got a direct ride to Sokcho (even if we had a sign for Hongcheon).
Thumb+sign.

Really good spot. The service area is reachable by foot + by bus from the Andong bus terminal (only 4 or 5 bus per day). We (a couple) waited less than 5minutes.
Thumb+sign.
Gas station just before expressway entrance, lots of traffic and two options to go south from here

I'm a 25-year-old Caucasian man. I had a clear sign that read in Hangul "Please, bring me to Busan," I found success within three minutes by standing between the two roads leading to the tollgate near the traffic light.
Great spot and the staff of the toll gate can’t bother you.

Good spot to go to Daegu. We (a couple) waited first at the exit of the SA but wasn't good place so we moved closer to the tolls gate and it worked better. We had a direct ride to Daegu. 
Thumb+sign.

I'm a 25-year-old Caucasian man. I waited there for an hour, and then the police arrived. They took me to the police station and put me on a bus to Seoul, my final destination. I believe the location is good; I was just unlucky. The cars were driving fast, so you should have a large sign indicating Daejeon or Seoul in Hangul.
Nice spot to get a ride towards Seoul or Daejeon. Wait just before ofrafter the toll gates. It took me around 15-20 minutes to get direct ride to Seoul (before the tollgates)
